description.brazilian: Salve a Ruína dos Navios
description.english: Rescue the Ruin of Ships
description.french: Sauver l'avaleur de navires
description.koreana: 난파선 물고기를 구조하세요
description.latam: Rescata a la Ruina de los Barcos
description.schinese: 拯救沉船鲸

description.brazilian: Salve o Waffles da tempestade
description.english: Save Waffles from the storm
description.french: Sauver Waffles de la tempête
description.koreana: 폭풍우에서 와플스를 구출하세요
description.latam: Salva a Waffles de la tormenta
description.schinese: 从风暴中拯救华夫饼

description.brazilian: Destranque a Porta Oceânica para o Lago Caudadupla
description.english: Unlock the Ocean Door to Twintail Lake
description.french: Ouvrir la Porte océanique donnant sur le Lac bifide
description.koreana: 트윈테일 호수로 향하는 오션 도어를 잠금 해제하세요
description.latam: Desbloquea la Puerta Oceánica al Lago Doble Aleta.
description.schinese: 解锁通往双尾湖的海门

description.brazilian: Convença Claude a revelar o segredo da caverna
description.english: Convince Claude to reveal the secret of the cavern
description.french: Convaincre Claude de révéler le secret de la Caverne
description.german: Überzeuge Claude, das Geheimnis der Höhle zu lüften
description.koreana: 클로드에게 동굴의 비밀을 털어놓으라고 설득하세요
description.latam: Convence a Claude para que revele el secreto de la caverna
description.schinese: 说服克劳德讲出岩洞的秘密

description.brazilian: Participe do Festival Centenário e conclua a história
description.english: Attend the Centennial Festival and complete the story
description.french: Assister au Festival du centenaire et terminer l'histoire
description.german: Besuche die Hundertjahrfeier und schließe die Geschichte ab
description.koreana: 100주년 축제에 참석하여 이야기를 완성하세요
description.latam: Asiste al Festival del Centenario y completa la historia.
description.schinese: 参加百年纪念庆典并完成故事剧情

description.brazilian: Estude todos os 151 peixes
description.english: Research all 151 fish
description.french: Trouver les 151 poissons
description.koreana: 151종의 물고기를 모두 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga los 151 peces
description.schinese: 研究全部151种鱼

description.brazilian: Reforme 100% da cidade
description.english: Renovate 100% of the town
description.french: Rénover la ville à 100 %
description.koreana: 마을을 100% 보수하세요
description.latam: Renovar un 100 % del pueblo
description.schinese: 100%翻修镇子

description.brazilian: Conclua a história em no máximo 30 dias no jogo
description.english: Complete the story in 30 in-game days or fewer
description.french: Terminer l'histoire en 30 jours du jeu ou moins
description.german: Schließe die Geschichte in 30 spielinternen Tagen oder weniger ab
description.koreana: 게임 내에서 30일 이내로 이야기를 완성하세요
description.latam: Completa la historia en 30 días de juego o menos.
description.schinese: 在30个游戏日之内完成故事剧情

description.brazilian: Conclua a história sem comprar, vender nem trocar qualquer peixe cru por conchas.
description.english: Complete the story without buying, selling, or trading for shells, any unprepared fish
description.french: Terminer l'histoire sans acheter, vendre ou échanger un poisson non préparé contre des coquillages
description.german: Schließe die Geschichte ab, ohne unzubereiteten Fisch gegen Muscheln zu kaufen, zu verkaufen oder zu handeln
description.koreana: 날생선을 조가비로 구매, 판매, 교환하지 않고 이야기를 완성하세요
description.latam: Completa la historia sin comprar, vender o intercambiar por caparazones cualquier pescado sin preparar.
description.schinese: 在不购买、贩卖、为贝壳交易未处理过的鱼的情况下完成故事剧情

description.brazilian: Conclua a história sem nunca chamar o reboque de Abi
description.english: Complete the story without ever calling Abi for a tow
description.french: Terminer l'histoire sans jamais demander de remorquage à Abi
description.german: Schließe die Geschichte ab, ohne Abi zum Abschleppen zu rufen
description.koreana: 아비에게 견인 연락을 하지 않고 이야기를 완성하세요
description.latam: Completa la historia sin llamar a Abi para que te remolque.
description.schinese: 在从未呼叫阿比盖尔拖船服务的情况下完成故事剧情

description.brazilian: Faça amizade com três personagens e colete os selos de cada um
description.english: Become good friends with three characters and collect their stamps
description.french: Être proche de trois personnages et récupérer leurs timbres
description.german: Freunde dich mit drei Charakteren an und sammle ihre Stempel
description.koreana: 3명의 캐릭터와 좋은 친구가 되어 그들의 스탬프를 모으세요
description.latam: Forja una buena amistad con tres personajes y recolecta sus sellos.
description.schinese: 与三个人物成为好朋友并收集他们的印花

description.brazilian: Colete todos os selos para o seu diário
description.english: Collect every stamp for your journal
description.french: Récupérer tous les timbres pour ton journal
description.german: Sammle alle Stempel für dein Tagebuch
description.koreana: 일지에 모든 스탬프를 모으세요
description.latam: Recolecta todos los sellos para tu diario.
description.schinese: 为你的日志收集所有印花

description.brazilian: Conclua todas as missões secundárias
description.english: Complete every side quest
description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes secondaires
description.koreana: 사이드 퀘스트를 모두 완료하세요
description.latam: Completa todas las misiones secundarias.
description.schinese: 完成所有支线任务

description.brazilian: "Ache" a Garoupa de Cartola
description.english: "Find" the Top Hat Grouper
description.french: « Trouver » le mérou au haut-de-forme
description.koreana: 실크 모자 그루퍼를
description.latam: Encuentra al Mero con galera.
description.schinese: “找到”高帽子石斑鱼

description.brazilian: Ouça 30 histórias de peixe incomuns pela cidade
description.english: Listen to 30 unusual fish stories around town
description.french: Écouter 30 histoires de poissons insolites en ville
description.german: Höre 30 ungewöhnliche Fischgeschichten in der Stadt
description.koreana: 마을 주변에서 30종의 특이한 물고기에 대한 이야기를 들으세요
description.latam: Escucha 30 historias de peces raras por el pueblo.
description.schinese: 在镇上听到30个奇鱼故事

description.brazilian: Troque uma enguia-crocodilo na Tecnoloja
description.english: Research a fish from every biome
description.french: Trouver un poisson de chaque biome
description.german: Erforsche einen Fisch aus jedem Biom
description.koreana: 모든 생물군계에서 물고기를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga un pez de cada bioma.
description.schinese: 在每种生物群落中研究一种鱼类

description.brazilian: Cozinhe todas as receitas
description.english: Cook every recipe
description.french: Cuisiner toutes les recettes
description.koreana: 모든 조리법을 요리하세요
description.latam: Cocina cada receta.
description.schinese: 烹饪所有菜式

description.brazilian: Estude o tubarão-broto-de-feijão, a barracuda-pão-de-mel e o camarão-fada
description.english: Research the Beansprout Shark, Gingerbread Barracuda and Fairy Shrimp
description.french: Trouver le requin-soja, le barracuda pain d'épice et la crevette-fée
description.koreana: 콩나물 상어, 진저브레드 창꼬치, 바다의 요정을 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga al Tiburón germinado, la Barracuda jengibre y el Camarón hada.
description.schinese: 研究豆芽鲨、姜饼梭鱼、仙女虾

description.brazilian: Estude o caranguejo-de-garra-demoníaca, o peixe-espada-espectral e o diabo-real
description.english: Research the Demon-Claw Crab, Ghostly Swordfish and Royal Devil
description.french: Trouver le crabe-pince-démoniaque, l'espadon fantôme et le démon royal
description.koreana: 악마 발톱 게, 귀신 황새치, 로열 데빌을 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga a la Pinza espantosa, al Pez espada fantasmal y al Diablo real.
description.schinese: 研究恶魔爪蟹、幽灵剑鱼、皇家魔鬼鱼

displayName.german: Das Zeug, aus dem Legenden sind

description.brazilian: Estude a lagosta-unicórnio, o peixe-ciclope e a quimera-de-nariz-afilado
description.english: Research the Unicorn Lobster, Cyclops Fish and Narrownose Chimaera
description.french: Trouver le homard-licorne, le poisson-cyclope et la chimère à nez pointu
description.koreana: 유니콘 랍스터, 키클롭스 물고기, 긴코 카이메라를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga a la Langosta unicornio, al Pez cíclope y a la Quimera de nariz corta.
description.schinese: 研究独角龙虾、独眼巨人鱼、尖吻银鲛

description.brazilian: Estude a estrelosa, o lúcio-do-vazio e a raia-cósmica
description.english: Research the Starosa, Void Pike and Cosmic Ray
description.french: Trouver l'étoilosa, le brochet du néant et la raie cosmique
description.german: Erforsche Starosa, Leere-Hecht und Kosmischer Rochen
description.koreana: 스타로사, 공허 강꼬치고기, 우주 가오리를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga a la Estrella rosa, a Lucio de vacío y a la Raya cósmica.
description.schinese: 研究粉色星鱼、虚空狗鱼、宇宙鳐

description.brazilian: Estude a enguia-pelicano-renegada, a truta-bico-de-pato e o peixe-voador-de-moonglow
description.english: Research the Rogue Pelican Eel, Duck-Billed Trout and Moonglow Flying Fish
description.french: Trouver l'anguille pélican solitaire, la truite à bec de canard et le poisson volant de Moonglow
description.german: Erforsche Aberranter Pelikanaal, Entenschnabelforelle und Fliegender Moonglow-Fisch
description.koreana: 로그 펠리컨 장어, 오리부리 송어, 문글로우 날치를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga a la Anguila pelícano granuja, a la Trucha cara de pato y al Pez volador de Moonglow.
description.schinese: 研究流氓鹈鹕鳗、鸭嘴鳟、月华湾飞鱼

description.brazilian: Estude o tubarão-anuvah, o tubarão-matalobo e o tubarão-dragão
description.english: Research the Anuvah Shark, Wolfsbane Shark and Dragonscale Shark
description.french: Trouver le requin anuvah, le requin aconit et le requin-dragon
description.koreana: 아누바 상어, 투구꽃 상어, 용비늘 상어를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga al Tiburón Anuva, al Tiburón acónito y al Tiburón escamas de dragón.
description.schinese: 研究阿努瓦鲨、狼牙鲨、龙鳞鲨

description.brazilian: Estude o peixe-coelho-espalhafatoso, a cuca-lanosa e o peixe-feiticeiro
description.english: Research the Jazzy Rabbit Fish, Woollyhead and Warlock Roll Fish
description.french: Trouver le poisson-lapin jazzy, le tête laineuse et le poisson-sorcier
description.koreana: 재즈 래빗 물고기, 양털머리어, 워록 롤 물고기를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga a la Quimera estilizada, al Cabeza lanuda y al Pez rollo hechicero.
description.schinese: 研究爵士兔子鱼、毛头鱼、术士滚筒鱼

description.brazilian: Estude o robalo-leitão, o camarão-camelo e a Zebra dos Mares
description.english: Research the Piglett Bass, Camel Shrimp and Zebrass
description.french: Trouver le bar porcin, la crevette-chameau et le zèbar
description.koreana: 피글렛 농어, 낙타 새우, 얼룩말 농어를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga al Róbalo lechón, al Camarón camello y al Róbalo Cebra.
description.schinese: 研究小猪鲈、骆驼虾、斑马鲈

description.brazilian: Estude o barrigudinho-açucarado, o peixe-marshmallow e a garoupa-de-algodão-doce
description.english: Research the Sugar Cube Guppy, Marshmallow Fish and Cotton Candy Grouper
description.french: Trouver le guppy-carré-de-sucre, le poisson-marshmallow et le mérou-barbe-à-papa
description.koreana: 각설탕 구피, 마시멜로 물고기, 솜사탕 그루퍼를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga a la Olomina terrón de azúcar, al Pez malvavisco y al Mero algodón de azúcar.
description.schinese: 研究糖块花鳉、棉花糖鱼、棉花糖石斑鱼

description.brazilian: Estude o grunhido-de-bigorna, o peixe-arqueiro e a barracuda-da-alabarda
description.english: Research the Anvil Grunt, Archer Fish and Halberd Barracuda
description.french: Trouver la tête d'enclume, le poisson archer et le barracuda-hallebarde
description.koreana: 앤빌 그런트, 화살 물고기 미늘창 창꼬치를 조사하세요
description.latam: Investiga al Gruñido de yunque, al Pez arquero y a la Barracuda alabarda.
description.schinese: 研究铁砧鲈、弓手鱼、戟梭鱼

description.brazilian: Ganhe 5000 conchas vendendo refeições com marisco
description.english: Earn 5000 shells selling shellfish meals
description.french: Gagner 5000 coquillages en vendant des plats de fruits de mer
description.german: Verdiene 5000 Muscheln mit dem Verkauf von Schalentiergerichten
description.koreana: 갑각류를 넣은 식사를 팔아서 조가비 5000개를 획득하세요
description.latam: Gana 5000 caparazones vendiendo comidas.
description.schinese: 通过贩卖贝类菜肴赚取5000个贝壳

description.brazilian: Fique 7 dias seguidos fora da cidade e pegue um peixe em cada bioma
description.english: Spend 7 continuous days away from town and catch a fish in every biome
description.french: Passer 7 jours d'affilée en dehors de la ville et attraper un poisson dans chaque biome
description.german: Verbringe 7 Tage am Stück außerhalb der Stadt und fang in jedem Biom einen Fisch
description.koreana: 7일 연속으로 마을에서 벗어나 모든 생물군계에서 물고기 한 마리씩 잡으세요
description.latam: Pasa 7 días seguidos fuera del pueblo y atrapa un pez de cada bioma.
description.schinese: 连续7天不回城镇，并在每个生物群落中捕获一条鱼

description.brazilian: Liberte um alabote, um atum-rabilho e um bacalhau-do-atlântico
description.english: Release an Atlantic Halibut, Bluefin Tuna and Atlantic Cod
description.french: Relâcher un flétan de l'Atlantique, un thon rouge du Nord et une morue de l'Atlantique
description.german: Lass einen Atlantischen Heilbutt, Atlantischen Blauflossen-Thun und Kabeljau frei
description.koreana: 대서양 넙치, 참다랑어, 대서양 대구를 풀어주세요
description.latam: Libera a un Fletán del Atlántico, a un Atún aleta azul y a un Bacalao del Atlántico.
description.schinese: 放生庸鲽、大西洋金枪鱼、大西洋海鳕

description.brazilian: Troque uma enguia-crocodilo na Tecnoloja
description.english: Trade an Alligator Eel at the Tech Shop
description.french: Échanger une anguille alligator à la boutique high-tech
description.koreana: 기술 업체에서 악어 장어를 거래하세요
description.latam: Intercambia una Anguila caimán en el Emporio Tecnológico.
description.schinese: 在科技专卖店中交易一条鳄鳗

displayName.brazilian: Dá Para Fazer Carinho no Cachorro!

description.brazilian: Faça carinho em Waffles 50 vezes
description.english: Pet Waffles 50 times
description.french: Caresser Waffles 50 fois
description.koreana: 와플스를 50번 쓰다듬으세요
description.latam: Acaricia a Waffles 50 veces
description.schinese: 抚摸华夫饼50次

description.brazilian: Pegue um peixe usando 30 combinações diferentes de vara, isca e chamariz
description.english: Catch a fish using 15 different combinations of rod, lure, and bait
description.french: Attraper un poisson en utilisant 15 combinaisons différentes de cannes, de leurres et d'appâts
description.german: Fang einen Fisch mit 15 verschiedenen Kombinationen von Rute, Kunstköder und Köder
description.koreana: 낚싯대, 루어, 미끼의 15가지 조합으로 물고기를 잡으세요
description.latam: Atrapa a un pez con 15 combinaciones diferentes de cañas, señuelos y cebos.
description.schinese: 使用15种不同的鱼竿、拟饵和铒食组合钓起一条鱼。

description.brazilian: Chame o reboque de Abi quando o seu barco estiver completamente operacional
description.english: Call Abi for a tow when your boat is fully functional
description.french: Appeler Abi pour un remorquage alors que ton bateau est en parfait état
description.german: Ruf Abi für einen Abschleppdienst, wenn dein Boot voll funktionsfähig ist
description.koreana: 선박에 전혀 문제가 없을 때 아비에게 견인해달라고 연락하세요
description.latam: Llama a Abi para pedirle que te remolque cuando tu barca esté completamente funcional.
description.schinese: 在你的船只完好无损时呼叫阿比盖尔的拖船服务

description.brazilian: Gaste 500 conchas num único reboque de volta para a cidade
description.english: Spend 500 shells on a single tow back to town
description.french: Dépenser 500 coquillages pour un seul remorquage jusqu'à la ville
description.german: Gib 500 Muscheln für einen einzigen Abschleppdienst zurück in die Stadt aus
description.koreana: 마을로 돌아가는 한 대의 예인선에서 조가비 500개를 사용하세요
description.latam: Gasta 500 caparazones en un solo remolque de regreso al pueblo.
description.schinese: 在返回镇子的一次拖船服务中花费500个贝壳

description.brazilian: Pegue uma sereia-dos-olhos-aracnídeos e a liberte em até 2 segundos
description.english: Catch a Spider-Eyed Mermaid, then release it within 2 seconds
description.french: Attraper une sirène œil d'araignée, puis la relâcher dans les 2 secondes
description.german: Fang eine Spinnenäugige Meerjungfrau und lass sie innerhalb von 2 Sekunden wieder frei
description.koreana: 거미눈 인어를 잡고 2초 안에 풀어주세요
description.latam: Atrapa a una Sirena ojos de araña y libérala en 2 segundos.
description.schinese: 捕捉一条蛛眼美人鱼，并在2秒内将其放生。

description.brazilian: Pegue um peixe acima de 1.000kg
description.english: Catch a fish over 1000kg
description.french: Attraper un poisson de plus de 1 000 kg
description.koreana: 1000kg이 넘는 물고기 한 마리를 잡으세요
description.latam: Atrapa a un pez de más de 1000 kg.
description.schinese: 捕获一条超过1000公斤的鱼
